ComicInfo.Summary: What happens when you get to the Land of Oz and you don't fit in? Jim the Cab-horse challenges the Sawhorse to a race-with alarming results. Dorothy meets her old friends-the Scarecrow, the Tin Woodman, the Cowardly Lion, Tik-tok, and more. The talking Gump-head is always good for a surprise.
